author: Jessie Hellmann, Peter Sullivan and Nathaniel Weixel
title: Overnight Health Care: More states order residents to stay at home | Trump looks to sell public on coronavirus response | Judges block Ohio, Texas abortion bans | Dems eye infrastructure in next relief bill
description: Welcome to Monday's Overnight Health Care. More states are issuing stay-at-home orders for their residents. But there are also governors who are holding out on tougher restrictions and who are facing pressure. Also, abort...
content: Welcome to Monday's Overnight Health Care. More states are issuing stay-at-home orders for their residents. But there are also governors who are holding out on tougher restrictions and who are facing pressure. Also, abortion rights groups are suing to ensure … [+14308 chars]
